src:
Lawan Partizan Belgrade, MU Diwajibkan Raih Kemenangan
06 Nov 2019, 16:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Manchester United, Fred mengincar kemenangan saat timnya berhadapan dengan Partizan Belgrade. Fred menyebut kemenangan mutlak didpatkan MU demi memastikan diri lolos ke babak berikutnya.
Manchester United akan melakoni pertandingan keempat Liga Europa pada hari Jumat (8/11) dini hari nanti. Mereka akan menjamu wakil Serbia, Partizan Belgrade di Old Trafford.
Jika United menang di pertandingan ini, maka peluang mereka untuk lolos ke babak knockout akan terbuka lebar. Pasalnya perolehan poin mereka bakal semakin sulit dikejar oleh Partizan yang kini menempati peringkat ketiga.
Fred menilai lolos lebih awal di Liga Europa bakal sangat membantu timnya. "Jika kami lolos lebih dahulu, kami memiliki sedikit waktu untuk tim ini bisa beristirahat," ujar Fred kepada situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
Opponent Partizan Belgrade, MU Required To Win Victory
Nov 6 2019, 16:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United midfielder Fred eyeing victory when his team faces Partizan Belgrade. Fred called Manchester United an absolute victory to ensure themselves qualify for the next round.
Manchester United will play the fourth Europa League match on Friday (8/11) early morning. They will host the Serbian representative, Partizan Belgrade at Old Trafford.
If United win this match, then their chances of qualifying for the knockout round will be wide open. Because the acquisition of their points will be increasingly difficult to be pursued by Partizan who is now ranked third.
Fred rate early escape in the Europa League would be very helpful for his team. "If we qualify first, we have a little time for this team to rest," Fred told the official Manchester United website.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
